name: Cyber Rodent Adventure!
description:
Inspired by a long-lost Xbox Live Arcade game I love, Cyber Rodent Adventure is my first attempt at making a rhythm-based flappy-bird style game.

Just a fun little title with a couple songs to play and enjoy, you are constantly falling and must avoid hitting the walls around you, and the obstacles inside the walls.

The only button you have to press is the spacebar, holding space will reverse gravity, Esc will return you to the main menu. Clicking on the level picture will take you to the level!
